dc:title: On Pilgrimage - July/August 1952
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: On the feast of the Visitation of the Blessed Virgin Mary she appreciates the work of mothers and the practice of the presence of God in the smallest acts. Describes Tamar's family and their house where she is caring for the grandchildren while Tamar and David have a vacation. Describes life with the children and lauds "manual labor as part of a penitential aw well as creative life."
